title: AD Carry ironically the hardest role to carry as long-term.
body: You can go 10/0 in lane and still get 1-shot by an averagely-farmed Mage/Assassin, or have a 2-item Tank sit on your face preventing you from doing anything. And god forbid an AD Carry actually has the ability to outplay some of the braindead carry-killers. Bang bang. Nerf the champion, nerf its core items, nerf the champion again.

replies.body: Umm have you seen what professional level/high elo players do when they're 10/0 as adc? They hard carry, because they actually understand engagement zones and so do their team mates, they don't even have to be 10/0, 3-5/0 will usually suffice. All that you are proving is it's hard to carry as a 10/0 adc in lower elos.
This thing is, though, I'm saying this from the perspective on someone who plays Tanks and plays Assassins for the most part. Also, I'm the same S5 rank as you so you're calling yourself low elo.
